page.title: 07POPULATION-VILLAGE SURVEY.
page.content: Questionnaires were distributed and 339 replies received. The households surveyed represent {34% of Lumley's {homes.}The results highlight the way in which the essential make-up of the village has changed over the last sixty years. {OCCUPATIONS:- }Self-employed:2.15%, Professional:27.91% Managerial:10.11% Skilled:20.85 % Semi-skilled:9.50% Unskilled:9.86% Unemployed:9.20% Retired:10.42%{ HOMES:-}Detached:9.64% Semi-Detached:66.67% Terraced:10.23% Bungalow:11.7% Flat:1.76% {REASONS FOR {SETTLING HERE:- }Pleasant area:25.44% Cost of housing:10.65 % Family reasons 30.77% Job:30.47% Other reasons:2.67%. {AREAS OF ORIGIN:-}Abroad:0.91% Outside Durham:36.55% Inside Durham:37.46% Local:25.08%. {PRESENT POPULATION OF LUMLEY:- approx. {5000. Survey Team.
